changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.workspace_status_code_authorization AS SELECT t.id, p.name AS product, s.name AS status_code FROM ruleform.workspace_authorization t JOIN ruleform.product p ON t.product = p.id JOIN ruleform.status_code s ON t.status_code = s.id WHERE t.authorization_type = '1';
ALTER TABLE readable.workspace_status_code_authorization OWNER TO core;
